select * from parcel_info where (user_id = #{userId} or consignee_id = #{userId})
and parcel_id IN ( select parcel_id from parcel_details p where (p.state = 1 or p.state = 5) and detail_time >= all ( select detail_time from parcel_details where parcel_details.parcel_id = p.parcel_id ))

limit #{offset}, 5
